title._content: Joining of waters, Cape Cod Canal  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Joining of waters, Cape Cod Canal [1914 April 21] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Name at bottom right, "Small's," might identify the photographer. Photo shows August Belmont, president of the Cape Cod Canal Construction Company, and other dignitaries at Foley's Dock, Massachusetts. (Source: New York Times, April 22, 1914) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Cape Cod Canal Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.17173 Call Number: LC-B2- 3222-10
